messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: careers (was experts)
messages.msgSnippet: ... That is hysterical!!! Thanks for sharing it.  -pam National Home Education Network  Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 3, 2004, at 8:33 AM, ivorygrace7@... wrote:

> Whenever people ask my 5yo what she wants to be when she grows up, she
> gets
> the question confused with Halloween.

That is hysterical!!! Thanks for sharing it. <G>

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: careers (was experts)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/3/2004 8:13:08 AM Eastern Standard Time, SandraDodd@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/3/2004 8:13:08 AM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:
<<Holly was asked what she wanted to be when she grew up and was being fed
options by the person asking. "An actress? a teacher?" (I forgot what else
she
said.)>>


Whenever people ask my 5yo what she wants to be when she grows up, she gets
the question confused with Halloween. The questioner always looks shocked when
she answers a vampire or a bunny or a princess!!!

--Jacqueline


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
